name: picturesquely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of a place) in an attractive way, especially when this is old-fashioned: It's a delightful inn, picturesquely situated on the Union Canal. Black and white houses are grouped picturesquely around a small church. See
picturesque
More examplesFewer examplesThe village, picturesquely suspended over a deep river gorge, is no longer a working community.a picturesque house in a picturesquely rural Canadian townThe country we passed in the early part of the day was picturesquely hilly.
